alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued February 22 at 7:00PM PST until February 24 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Hard Freeze Watch, morning lows below 20 degrees possible. * WHERE...Apple and Lucerne Valleys. * WHEN...From Wednesday evening through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS..The hard freeze could kill crops, and other sensitive vegetation. It may also damage uninsulated plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A slow warming trend will occur into the weekend.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing
